You asked several questions, so I'll take them one=

1) you hope what? that i made a fool out of myself or that i c=
alled it in or perhaps both?=C2=A0 

I hope you called it in. Your resistan=

d didn't just say that to stop me from prompting you. I don't know of cours=

f it helps save a child from am abductor, I think it would be worth it.

2)=
 Why don't you get on the box, and do some asking?

nce you provide.

3) Why are negative people on

nscience, not prompt you to give that information to the police?=C2=A0 Agai=
n how is that a negative thing to do?

e to ignore it?

 listener to try to hear what you heard, rather than what they hear with no=
 hints.=C2=A0 So if you want to know what people really hear without your h=
ints, you need to send them out unlabeled.

ts, you need to send them out unlabeled.<br><br><br>--- On <b>Tue, 7/27/10,=
